lead_paragraph: Raphael Haim Golb was found guilty of identity theft for e-mails he fabricated that purported to be admissions of plagiarism by Lawrence H. Schiffman, a New York University professor.
snippet: Raphael Haim Golb was found guilty of identity theft for e-mails he fabricated that purported to be admissions of plagiarism by Lawrence H. Schiffman, a New York University professor.

headline.main: Son of Dead Sea Scrolls Expert Is Convicted
headline.seo: Son of Expert on Dead Sea Scrolls Is Convicted
headline.print_headline: Son of Expert on Dead Sea Scrolls Is Convicted of Identity Theft
